metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: Dataset of hydrometeorological observation network (an automatic weather station of Sidaoqiao mixed forest station, 2014)
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（混合林站自动气象站-2014）
metadata.description:
This data set contains meteorological element observation data from January 1, 2014 to December 31, 2014 at the downstream mixed forest station of heihe hydrometeorological observation network.The station is located at sidao bridge, dalaihubu town, ejin banner, Inner Mongolia.The longitude and latitude of the observation point are 101.1335e, 41.9903n and 874m above sea level.The air temperature and relative humidity sensors are located at 28m, facing due north.The barometer is installed in the anti-skid box on the ground;Tilting bucket rain gauge installed at 28m;The wind speed and direction sensor is located at 28m, facing due north.The four-component radiometer is installed at 24m, facing due south;Two infrared thermometers are installed at 24m, facing due south and the probe facing vertically downward.Two photosynthetically active radiators were installed at a position of 24m, facing due south, with one probe vertically upward and one probe vertically downward.The soil temperature probe is buried at 0cm of the surface and 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm and 100cm underground, 2m to the south of the meteorological tower.The soil water probe is buried 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm and 100cm underground, 2m to the south of the meteorological tower.The soil heat flow plates (3 pieces) are buried in the ground 6cm underground, 2m to the south of the meteorological tower.
Observation items are: air temperature and humidity (Ta_28m, RH_28m) (unit: c, percentage), pressure (Press) (unit: hundred mpa), precipitation (Rain) (unit: mm), wind speed (WS_28m) (unit: m/s), wind (WD_28m) (unit: degrees), the radiation of four component (DR, UR, DLR_Cor, ULR_Cor, Rn) (unit: watts per square meter), the surface radiation temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (unit:(unit: Ts_0cm, Ts_2cm, Ts_4cm, Ts_10cm, Ts_20cm, Ts_40cm, Ts_60cm, Ts_100cm) (unit: Celsius), soil moisture (Ms_2cm, Ms_4cm, Ms_10cm, Ms_20cm, Ms_40cm, Ms_60cm, Ms_100cm) (unit:Volumetric water content, percentage), upward and downward photosynthetically active radiation (PAR_up, PAR_down) (in micromol/m2 seconds).
Processing and quality control of observed data :(1) ensure 144 pieces of data every day (every 10min), and mark by -6999 in case of data missing;Due to the data collector, part of the data was missing between 2014.5.9-6.8 and 2014.11.9-12.7.(2) excluding the time with duplicate records;(3) data that obviously exceeds the physical significance or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the part marked with red letter in the data is the data in question;(5) date and time have the same format, and date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: September 10, 2014, 10:30;(6) the naming rule is: AWS+ site name.
For information of hydrometeorological network or station, please refer to Li et al.(2013), and for observation data processing, please refer to Liu et al.(2011).
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2014年1月1日至2014年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网下游混合林站气象要素观测数据。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗达来呼布镇四道桥，下垫面是柽柳与胡杨。观测点的经纬度是101.1335E,41.9903N，海拔874m。空气温度、相对湿度传感器架设在28m处，朝向正北；气压计安装在地面上的防撬箱内；翻斗式雨量计安装在28m处；风速与风向传感器架设在28m，朝向正北；四分量辐射仪安装在24m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在24m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；两个光合有效辐射仪安装在24m处，朝向正南，探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm、100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分探头埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm、100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方。
观测项目有：空气温湿度（Ta_28m、RH_28m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、风速（WS_28m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_28m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_100cm）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)、向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_up、PAR_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；由于数据采集器的原因，在2014.5.9-6.8和2014.11.9-12.7之间数据部分缺失；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2014-9-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Li et al. (2013)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2011)。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of meteorological and hydrological data collected from an automatic weather station in mixed forest environments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在混合森林环境中，从自动气象站收集的气象和水文数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: air temperature at 28m, relative humidity at 28m, atmospheric pressure at ground level, precipitation, wind speed at 28m, wind direction at 28m, four-component radiation, surface radiation temperature, soil heat flux, soil temperature at various depths, soil moisture at various depths, photosynthetically active radiation upward, photosynthetically active radiation downward
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 28米处的空气温度，28米处的相对湿度，地面气压，降水，28米处的风速，28米处的风向，四分量辐射，地表辐射温度，土壤热通量，各深度的土壤温度，各深度的土壤湿度，向上的光合有效辐射，向下的光合有效辐射。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of deploying sensors at varying heights and depths in meteorological and hydrological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象和水文研究中，在不同高度和深度部署传感器有什么意义？
Definition.AnswerEn: Deploying sensors at varying heights and depths allows for comprehensive data collection of different environmental parameters. For example, air temperature and relative humidity sensors are placed at 28 meters to capture atmospheric conditions, while soil temperature and moisture sensors are buried at various depths to monitor subsurface conditions. This approach helps in understanding the interactions between the atmosphere and the land surface, which is crucial for modeling and predicting ecological and hydrological processes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在不同的高度和深度部署传感器可以全面收集不同环境参数的数据。例如，空气温度和相对湿度传感器被放置在28米的高度，以捕捉大气条件，而土壤温度和湿度传感器则埋在不同深度，以监测地下条件。这种方法有助于理解大气与地表之间的相互作用，这对于建模和预测生态和水文过程至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the effectiveness of data collection methods and quality control measures from the observed patterns of missing data and marked uncertainties in a dataset?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从数据集中观察到的数据缺失模式和标记的不确定性中可以推断出数据收集方法和质量控制措施的有效性吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data collection methods and quality control measures indicate that efforts are made to ensure data completeness and accuracy, such as marking missing data with -6999 and excluding duplicates or out-of-range values. However, the presence of missing data during specific periods suggests challenges in data acquisition, possibly due to equipment limitations or environmental factors. The marking of questionable data in red further reflects a rigorous approach to maintaining data integrity.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法和质量控制措施表明，采取了努力确保数据的完整性和准确性，例如用-6999标记缺失数据，并排除重复或超出范围的值。然而，在特定时期存在缺失数据表明数据获取面临挑战，可能是由于设备限制或环境因素。用红色标记可疑数据进一步反映了维护数据完整性的严格方法。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors lead to data gaps or errors in meteorological measurements in remote ecological stations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致偏远生态站气象测量中数据缺口或错误的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data gaps or errors in meteorological measurements at remote ecological stations can be caused by several factors, such as equipment failures, like the data collector issues that led to data missing from May 9 to June 8 and November 9 to December 7 in 2014. Harsh environmental conditions might also affect sensor performance and data accuracy. Additionally, errors may arise from redundant records, measurements that exceed physical or instrumental limits, and questionable data indicated by anomalies which require further investigation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在偏远生态站的气象测量中，数据缺口或错误可能由多个因素引起，例如设备故障，比如2014年5月9日至6月8日和11月9日至12月7日期间数据采集器出现的问题导致数据缺失。恶劣的环境条件也可能影响传感器的性能和数据的准确性。此外，错误可能源于冗余记录、超过物理或仪器限制的测量，以及需要进一步调查的异常数据所指示的可疑数据。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences on data integrity when ensuring daily measurements with a frequency of 144 data points, especially when facing data loss or instrument limitations?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在确保每日测量频率为144个数据点时，面对数据丢失或仪器限制时，数据完整性可能面临的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Ensuring daily measurements with a frequency of 144 data points can lead to challenges in maintaining data integrity, particularly when data loss occurs due to instrument limitations or malfunctions, such as during specific periods when data is missing. The integrity can be compromised when missing data is marked with placeholders like -6999, potentially affecting the continuity and reliability of the dataset. Moreover, data integrity may also be impacted by the necessity to remove duplicate records or data points that exceed physical or instrumental ranges, which can lead to gaps or uncertainties in the dataset.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 确保每天测量144个数据点的频率可能会导致维护数据完整性方面的挑战，特别是在由于仪器限制或故障而导致数据丢失的特定时期。当缺失数据用占位符如-6999标记时，完整性可能会受到影响，从而影响数据集的连续性和可靠性。此外，数据完整性还可能受到删除重复记录或超出物理或仪器范围的数据点的必要性的影响，这可能导致数据集中的空白或不确定性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures should be followed to ensure the accuracy and quality control of meteorological data collected at a mixed forest station, considering potential issues such as missing data or instrument limitations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保在混合森林站收集的气象数据的准确性和质量控制，应遵循哪些程序，考虑到潜在问题如数据缺失或仪器限制？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure the accuracy and quality control of meteorological data collected at a mixed forest station, several procedures should be followed: (1) Ensure that data is collected every 10 minutes, aiming for 144 data points daily, and mark any missing data with a placeholder (e.g., -6999). (2) Remove any duplicate records to maintain data integrity. (3) Delete data that significantly exceeds physical or instrument range limits. (4) Flag any questionable data in red for further review. (5) Standardize the format of date and time, ensuring they are in the same column, such as '2014-9-10 10:30'. These steps help maintain data quality despite challenges such as missing data due to data logger issues or data that falls outside expected ranges.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保在混合森林站收集的气象数据的准确性和质量控制，应遵循以下几个程序：(1) 确保每10分钟收集一次数据，目标是每天收集144个数据点，并用占位符（例如-6999）标记任何缺失的数据。(2) 删除任何重复记录，以维护数据完整性。(3) 删除显著超出物理或仪器范围限制的数据。(4) 将任何可疑数据标记为红色以便进一步审查。(5) 标准化日期和时间的格式，确保它们在同一列中，例如'2014-9-10 10:30'。这些步骤有助于维护数据质量，尽管面临由于数据记录仪问题导致的缺失数据或超出预期范围的数据等挑战。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques are used to ensure the accuracy and quality of meteorological and hydrological data collection in mixed forest environments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在混合森林环境中，使用哪些技术来确保气象和水文数据收集的准确性和质量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data accuracy and quality in mixed forest environments are ensured through several methods such as ensuring a set number of daily data entries (144 entries per day, every 10 minutes), marking missing data with a specific code (-6999), removing duplicate records, eliminating data that exceed physical or instrument limits, marking questionable data with a specific notation, and maintaining consistent date and time formats.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在混合森林环境中，数据的准确性和质量通过多种方法得以确保，例如确保每天有一定数量的数据录入（每天144条，每10分钟一次），用特定代码（-6999）标记缺失数据，删除重复记录，消除超过物理或仪器限制的数据，用特定标记标记可疑数据，以及保持一致的日期和时间格式。
